raw_text: ROSABELL CHELVAM nee RAJANAYAGAM (Formerly Librarian,​ National Library Services Board). Cherished daughter of late N.V. Rajanayagam and late Mrs Atputham Rajanayagam of Atputha Lodge,​ Uduvil. Beloved wife of Devadas Chelvam,​ sister of late Christy Atputharajah,​ Bella,​ Rajapathy,​ Rajayogini,​ Rajasoruba,​ Dr Rajula and Vaseeharan,​ sister-in-law of Roberts,​ Mitrakrishnan,​ Cyril Manuelpillai,​ Sri Rangan,​ late Kulam and Dave,​ beloved aunt of Dr. M.C. Shivanthan,​ Dr. Jevon Yudhishdran and Dr. Rayno Navinan,​ passed away. Funeral service on Monday 13th November at 10.30 a.m. at the Cathedral,​ Jaffna. Contact Sister Mrs C.R. Mitrakrishnan – 0716913505.073886
